results.code:
238 def pack_aac(io_buffer: BytesIO, data: np.ndarray, rate: int):
239     process = subprocess.Popen(
240         [
241             "ffmpeg",
242             "-f",
243             "s16le",  # 输入16位有符号小端整数PCM
244             "-ar",
245             str(rate),  # 设置采样率
246             "-ac",
247             "1",  # 单声道
248             "-i",
249             "pipe:0",  # 从管道读取输入
250             "-c:a",
251             "aac",  # 音频编码器为AAC
252             "-b:a",
253             "192k",  # 比特率
254             "-vn",  # 不包含视频
255             "-f",
256             "adts",  # 输出AAC数据流格式
257             "pipe:1",  # 将输出写入管道
258         ],
259         stdin=subprocess.PIPE,
260         stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
261         stderr=subprocess.PIPE,
262     )
263     out, _ = process.communicate(input=data.tobytes())
results.issue_text: Starting a process with a partial executable path
